page.title: 07RECREATION FOR YOUNG PEOPLE
page.content: There are various organisations which cater for children and teenagers. The{playgroup}meets on two mornings a week for children from about two years of age to school entry. There is a{cub scout}group for boys up to about 11 years of age, and for girls of the same age a{brownie}group. For older children there is a{Scout {Troop}and{Girl Guide Troop.} Older teenagers may go into the{Venture {Group. The{badminton club}has a junior section, as do the{tennis club}and the {cricket club. There is a{Youth Club,}but this meets only once a week. Some teenagers join in out-of-school activities at Grove, Market Drayton. Outside the village, some go{swimming at Nantwich, others go{riding,}to a {gymnastic club}at Crewe or{fishing.
